equipment.name: Greaves of the Empty Tomb
base_affixes: Create <text class='c_important'>Desecrated Ground</text> beneath your <text class='c_important'>Sever</text> spectres as they travel, damaging enemies for <text class='c_random'>0.81</text> Shadow damage over <text class='c_number'>3</text> seconds.
+13.2% Lucky Hit Chance with Shadow Damage
16.04% Damage Reduction from Shadow Damage Over Time-Affected Enemies

equipment.name: Ring of Starless Skies
base_affixes: Casting a <text class='c_important'>Core</text> Skill cast reduces the Resource cost of your <text class='c_important'>Core</text> Skills by <text class='c_number'>18%</text>, up to a maximum of <text class='c_number'>60%</text>. Resets upon using a non-<text class='c_important'>Core</text> Skill.

equipment.name: Temerity
base_affixes: Effects that Heal you beyond <text class='c_number'>150%</text> Life grant you a <text class='c_important'><u>Barrier</u></text> up to <text class='c_random'>108.05%</text> of your Maximum Life that lasts for <text class='c_number'>12</text> seconds. Potions can be used while at full Life.
<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit:</text> Up to a 5% Chance to Heal +0.44 Life

equipment.name: Soulbrand
base_affixes: Your Healing Potion no longer Heals instantly, instead it grants a <text class='c_important'><u>Barrier</u></text> for <text class='c_number'>300%</text> of the healing for <text class='c_number'>6</text> seconds. While you have a <text class='c_important'><u>Barrier</u></text>, you gain <text class='c_random'>18.58%</text> Damage Reduction.
+8.4% Lucky Hit Chance while You Have a Barrier

equipment.name: Gargoyle Greatsword
strikethrough_affixes: You deal <text class='c_random'>172.03%</text> increased damage for <text class='c_number'>9</text> seconds after the <text class='c_important'>Shadowblight</text> Key Passive damages enemies <text class='c_number'>15</text> times.
+24% Critical Strike Damage with Bone Skills
added_affixes: Whenever your <text class='c_important'>Blood</text> Skills <text class='c_important'><u>Overpower</u></text> you gain <text class='c_random'>57.69%</text> Attack Speed for <text class='c_number'>6</text> seconds.

equipment.name: Loop
base_affixes: Each cast of <text class='c_important'>Blood Lance</text> will launch an additional <text class='c_important'>Blood Lance</text> at a Nearby enemy when it first hits an enemy that is already lanced, dealing <text class='c_random'>71.28%</text> of normal damage.
+21% Critical Strike Damage with Bone Skills

equipment.name: Banished Lord's Talisman
base_affixes: After you spend <text class='c_number'>450</text> of your Primary Resource, your next <text class='c_important'>Core</text> Skill is guaranteed to <text class='c_important'><u>Overpower</u></text>. Your Critical Strikes that <text class='c_important'><u>Overpower</u></text> deal <text class='c_random'>144.11%</text> increased damage.

equipment.name: Boneweave Helm
strikethrough_affixes: <text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit:</text> When you hit a Crowd Controlled enemy, there is up to a <text class='c_random'>43.49%</text> chance for that Crowd Control effect to spread to another unaffected enemy.
added_affixes: You gain <text class='c_random'>1.43%</text> increased Armor for <text class='c_number'>5.6</text> seconds when you deal any form of damage, stacking up to <text class='c_random'>86.08%</text>.

equipment.name: Runic Gloves
base_affixes: +11.25% Critical Strike Chance Against Injured Enemies
strikethrough_affixes: Each cast of <text class='c_important'>Blood Lance</text> will launch an additional <text class='c_important'>Blood Lance</text> at a Nearby enemy when it first hits an enemy that is already lanced, dealing <text class='c_random'>69.03%</text> of normal damage.
<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit:</text> Up to a +19.55% Chance to Slow
added_affixes: Gain <text class='c_random'>24.64%</text> increased Critical Strike Chance for <text class='c_number'>9</text> seconds when you cast <text class='c_important'>Corpse Tendrils</text>. You deal <text class='c_random'>49.28%</text> bonus Critical Strike Damage to enemies damaged by <text class='c_important'>Corpse Tendrils</text>.
